speaker: CADE
text: Now is Mortimer lord of this city. And here, sitting

speaker: CADE
text: upon London Stone, I charge and command

speaker: CADE
text: that, of the city’s cost, the Pissing Conduit run

speaker: CADE
text: nothing but claret wine this first year of our reign.

speaker: CADE
text: And now henceforward it shall be treason for any

speaker: CADE
text: that calls me other than Lord Mortimer.

speaker: DICK
text: If this fellow be wise, he’ll never call you Jack

speaker: DICK
text: Cade more. I think he hath a very fair warning.

speaker: DICK
text: My lord, there’s an army gathered together in

speaker: CADE
text: Come, then, let’s go fight with them. But first, go

speaker: CADE
text: and set London Bridge on fire, and, if you can,

speaker: CADE
text: burn down the Tower too. Come, let’s away.
